Title: Home Improvement
Plot:
"Butthole and Joe" paint Mr. Anderson`s house. Bored with that, they sniff paint thinner, destroy quite a few things, paint his cat's butt, and decide to go for a nice ride on his lawnmower. (After several complaints,the scenes of the boys getting high off the paint thinner and painting the cats butt were later removed.)

Biz Markie - Just A Friend

Edie Brickell & New Bohemians - What I Am
